q2.spacebook

Class MessageSort

  • java.lang.Object
    • q2.spacebook.MessageSort

  • public class MessageSort
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that contains methods to sort messages. Methods to sort a primitive array or an arraylist of Message objects. Messages sorted by message text in ascending order.

    • Constructor Summary

      MessageSort()

      Sorts an array of Message objects by their message text.
      private static void swap(Message[] arMsg, int to, int from)
      Swaps the position of two Message elements in a Message[] array

        int to,
        int from)
        Swaps the position of two Message elements in a Message[] array
        Parameters:
        arMsg - Message[] array containing the elements to be swapped
        to - Array element position to be swapped to
